name: Yuechen Zhang
aboutIntro: Hello, Welcome to my site. My name is Yuechen Zhang, and usually, people call me Joe.
aboutCurStat: I graduated from the University of Waterloo with a BCS, Data Science degree in December, 2022. Right now, I am a Data Engineer at Rakuten Rewards.
aboutExp: From coursework, internships and working experiences, I gained lots of knowledge and experience in Computer Science, Statistics, Machine Learning, Database Management, Data Science, Data Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering.
aboutSkill: Languages and Technologies I am proficient in include: C, C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, R, Python, TensorFlow, SQL, NoSQL, Git, DBT, Snowflake, Hadoop, Spark etc.
transcript: A Copy of my most recent transcript can be found
educationSummary: I am a fourth year Data Science student from the University of Waterloo with 4.0 GPA
The degree requires us to take both computer science and statistic courses,
Including topics such as Machine Learning,  Data Structure, Algorithms, Operating Systems, Statistical Inference and etc.
I am also a faster learner who can quickly adapt to new environments and expand my tech stack.
schoolProjectInfo: Here is also a list of projects that I have completed at school.

schoolProjects.title: STAT441 - Classification - Sentiment Analysis with Dutch Text using SVM
CS370 - Numerical Computation - Interpolation and Parametric Spline
CS370 - Numerical Computation - DCT and JPEG Compression
CS246 - Object Oriented Programming - Watopoly (Waterloo Version of Monopoly) Using C++

detail: Researched on self-service BI tools including Apache Superset, Metabase, ThoughtSpot, Mode, Google Looker and Sigma. Made detailed comparisons and contrasts between them, which helps the team in deciding the best BI tool to use for all stakeholders in the future.

Fortified communication skills and presentation skills by demoing 2 of the BI tools with the highest preference rank to the team. Clearly presented how to use the platforms as well as essential features for those 2 tools
Built dimensional models with DBT, Snowflake and SQL, designed and implemented dim and fact tables including products, warehouses, sales and etc.
Built data visialization dashboards with Mode, Thoughspot and Sigma.

Worked on a web application that present the data processed by the NLP Algorithms on Regulatory Documents to help legislators and economists find regulations more efficiently, and assit them in making decisions.
Focused on front-end implementation based on new UI/UX, prototyping and developing new features, building and testing APIs, detecting and fixing bugs, and conducting code refactoring.
Conducted code refactoring for the project, and modularized the code to follow object-oriented programming standards.
Proposed and implemented createive features given clients are not clear on what is needed, and give limited instructions. Managed to fulfill client requirements in a limited time.
Fortified experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Express, NPM, Python, Spacy, Node, Git, etc.

The team mainly focused on maintaining financial data purchased from financial data vendors, updating daily price data to the company's database, and make sure the data is consistent across databases.
I also support other teams such as the production and the operation team by querying data, monitoring data updates, and producing financial reports.
Maintained data integrity over 3 databases with over 100 tables. Investigated and cleaned over 1 million misrecorded and inconsistent records from these databases.
Developed and maintained programs that parse daily hedge fund net asset values from email bodies, and load the data into the databases.
Mainly programming the scripts with Python and SQL. Gained practical knowledge in database management.
Since I had a Computer Science background, I helped the team build intelligent tools that simplify repetitive jobs, digitize forms and manual works, and manage data produced.
Collaborated with team members for data migration, moved on-premise data into the cloud using MS Access, MS Flow, and SharePoint RESTful APIs.

Programmed MS Power App for a digital form used for job site inspections. Utilized MS Flow to generate PDF summaries and send auto email confirmations. Developed a Power BI dashboard to reveal the distribution of the answers.
Fostered problem-solving skills through proposing and building new management systems for the division’s contracts.
Enhanced communication skills developed by training over 40 employees on the new job site inspection procedure.
Built automation processes with MS Flow to automatically track locate complaints and locate information requests.
Mainly focused on creating data visualization reports for the algorithm that predict bond yields. Also assisted in deploying scripts on AWS, and worked on some frontend features with React.
Built precision metrics for Overbond’s bond pricing algorithm and created visual reports of the algorithm’s precision errors using Python and Tableau.
Utilized Google Cloud API to update and send weekly precision reports for further collaboration with the Data Science team for algorithm precision improvements.
Assisted the research team to run developing models in AWS instances for speed. Developed solid skills in Pandas and R.
Collaborated with the software development team to implement web app features with JS and React.
